sentences.english: Whenever sang my songs on the stage, on my own!

My first experience of 'psychobabble' was at school.

definition: not a sound to be heard (idiom)
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
to chat with a low voice
talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
(of a city etc) ablaze with lights
insect or insect-like small creature (literary)/base person (used as a curse word)
